duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage sourcing activities for hardware, software, telecom, data center, and professional services including network hardware (e.g., routing, switching, NICs, etc.)
Lead and coordinate all procurement efforts to identify, survey, audit, assess, and qualify new suppliers
Lead the business negotiation process with external suppliers and own contract initiation and closure
Develop a comprehensive procurement strategy focused on the network hardware ecosystem: hardware, service, licensing, and support
Own and lead the supplier interface for all Requests for information (RFI), Requests for proposal (RFP), and Requests for quote (RFQ) services
Identify key benchmark suppliers in RFx efforts and partner to identify evaluation criteria and provide relevant data back to the internal team
Continuously measure and improve supplier actual performance against mutually agreed Service Level Agreements (SLA)
Ensure best-in-class pricing and terms are secured for equipment and services
Identify, qualify, and formalize which suppliers are on preferred supplier list and ensure internal partner alignment
Lead business review process to measure, analyze, and identify points of strength and weakness with regard to supplier performance and drive continuous improvement of supplier performance
Be the sourcing subject matter authority helping to identify and demonstrate best practices in the realms of procurement, supplier management, and category management
